State - Enum in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.fsm
Enum defining the states available for a Charge types
StateMachine - Class in il.ac.ariel.liortamir.javalab.fsm
This class implements the State and Singletone design patterns.
An array of State maps the State ordinal and and Event ordinal to a new State.
A HashMap maps relevant states to their AbstractStateHandler
implementation.
